document.full_text: japan's nintendo co ltd said it would release a successor to its wii video game console in 2012, and will release the new wii specifications at the los angeles game show this june.
document.title: nintendo to release successor to wii next year
lines_and_colors: japan's nintendo co ltd said it would release a successor to its wii video game console in 2012, and will release the new wii specifications at the los angeles game show this june.
